bike.description: Alpha Red Aluminum w/Aluminum Armor, ABP, Full Floater, alloy EVO Link, E2 tapered head tube, oversized pivot bearings, ISCG03 mounts, 142x12mm or 135x12mm rear axle adaptors, replaceable derailleur hanger, adjustable geometry, 170mm travel

components.description: DT Swiss E 2000, 32 hole, 20mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub; tubeless compatible
Bontrager Rhythm Pro, 31.8mm, 50mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek Frustum SE Light Edition, E2
Avid Elixir CR hydraulic disc brakes
Aluminum armor, ABP hardware for use with 135x12mm hub, Bontrager shock pump
